snippet.title: Spelunky (2012) - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Xbox Live Arcade on July 4th, 2012!

http://www.spelunkyworld.com

Contact: http://spelunkyworld.com/info.html
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/spelunkyworld

Inspired by roguelikes, Spelunky is a unique platformer with randomized levels, where a challenging new adventure awaits you each time you play. Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with monsters, traps, and treasure. Discover, purchase, or steal items to help you survive. Each playthrough offers new experiences and Spelunky players have enjoyed dying thousands of times to uncover all of the game's secrets.
 
The XBLA version has new graphics, new music, multiplayer modes (co-op and deathmatch), and more of everything you loved about the original game! We really hope you like it! In the meantime, you can play the original Spelunky for free at http://www.spelunkyworld.com.

Trailer Credits:

Spelunky Guy - Andy Hull
Caveman - Derek Yu
Men in Garage - Ron DeLuca and Co.

SFXR: http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Spelunky XBLA Music by Eirik Suhrke: http://strotch.net/

Thanks to Jonathan Perry, Christopher Yamaoka, Jennifer Ming, Christina Yang Hull, Frances Fontanilla, and Mrs. Yu for their feedback!
